point1: With a BTech in AI & DS from DJ Sanghavi College of Engineering, Satyavrat Tiwari is poised to leverage his academic foundation in driving innovation and problem-solving in the industry.
point2: His most impressive technical work is the development of a multilingual legal chatbot using the Gemini API, React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, designed to answer legal queries with contextual accuracy.
point3: As a skilled developer, Satyavrat is proficient in a range of programming languages, including C, Python, and Java, with expertise in frameworks such as React.js, Node.js, and Flask.
point4: With a strong understanding of the legal domain, Satyavrat has contributed to the development of a case analysis application utilizing the Gemini API, featuring a dummy case generator for law students.
point5: As a passionate AI and Data Science Engineering student, Satyavrat brings a unique combination of technical expertise, innovative thinking, and a relentless drive for problem-solving, making him a valuable asset to any organization.
